mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_alarm_key (id, type, alarm_key, alarm_value, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, type, alarm_key, alarm_value, remark from t_alarm_key
